snippet: The Mexico Supreme Court on Wednesday overturned a lower court ruling that allowed a drug kingpin accused of murdering an American drug enforcement agent in the 1980s to walk free.
abstract: Mexico Supreme Court overturns lower court ruling that released drug kingpin Rafael Caro Quintero, who is accused of murdering American drug enforcement agent Enrique Camarena in the 1980s.
lead_paragraph: The Mexico Supreme Court on Wednesday overturned a lower court ruling that allowed a drug kingpin accused of murdering an American drug enforcement agent in the 1980s to walk free.

headline.main: Mexico: Court Orders Full Sentence in Drug Agent’s Death, but Killer Is Free
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Court Orders Full Sentence In Drug Agent’s Death, but Killer Is Free
